Package org.kj.player

Class HumanPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kj.player.Player
      • org.kj.player.HumanPlayer

  • public class HumanPlayer
extends Player
    Interacts with a person through command line. Prompts player for their Action and displays information to them. At each stage the player is shown their own hand and the number of cards their opponent is currently holding.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      HumanPlayer​(java.lang.String name, java.util.Scanner scan)
      Constructs a HumanPlayer with the specified name.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Action playTurn​(int opponentHandSize)
      Displays the player's current hand and the number of cards the opponent has.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HumanPlayer

        public HumanPlayer​(java.lang.String name,
                   java.util.Scanner scan)
        Constructs a HumanPlayer with the specified name. The scanner is used to get input from the player.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the player
        scan - the scanner that gets player input

    • Method Detail

      • playTurn

        public Action playTurn​(int opponentHandSize)
        Displays the player's current hand and the number of cards the opponent has. Then the player is prompted to choose either hit or stand.
        Specified by:
        playTurn in class Player
        Parameters:
        opponentHandSize - the number of cards the opponent has
        Returns:
        either Action.HIT or Action.STAND depending on the player choice
